Cloud Vision V1 API - Class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::NormalizedVertex (v0.6.4)

Reference documentation and code samples for the Cloud Vision V1 API class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::NormalizedVertex.

A vertex represents a 2D point in the image. NOTE: the normalized vertex coordinates are relative to the original image and range from 0 to 1.
